job_details.Functieomschrijving:
+ Gross monthly salary between EUR 5,115 and EUR 7,308 (scale 10) for a 36 hour week
          + Thirteenth month's salary and 8% holiday allowance
          + 11% Employee Benefit Budget
          + EUR 1,400 development budget per year
          + Hybrid working: balance between home and office work (possible for most roles)
          + A pension, for which you can set the maximum amount of your personal contribution
       Are you comfortable building all components of our next-level GenAI solutions as a full-stack software engineer?
       Good! Then read on...
       You and your job
       We need your help to design, build and run groundbreaking GenAI solutions that are as valuable for our customers to use as they are fun for us to develop. As a Full Stack Engineer you will join a multi-disciplinary team where you will have end-to-end responsible for your solutions.
       Practical examples
          + Work directly with (internal) customers to learn how processes and systems work.
          + Design and build responsible and cost effective GenAI solutions for millions of customers.
          + Convert these generic parts to re-usable building blocks used by 1000+ tech teams.
          + Pair-program with team members to solve critical or complex problems.
       Facts & figures
          + 36 or 40 hours a week.
          + Mostly greenfields, little legacy.
          + 43,822 Rabobank colleagues around the world.
       Top responsibilities
          + Design, build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable GenAI solutions.
          + Contribute to the relentless automation of the above activities.
          + Give and receive help from peers, experts and stakeholders so we can improve together.
       We believe that bringing together people's differences is what makes us an even better bank. Talking of Rabobank: We are a Dutch bank that operates in 38 countries for over 9,5000,000 customers. Together with these customers, our members and partners we stand side by side to create a world in which everyone has access to enough healthy food. In the Netherlands we work to create a country in which people are happy with how they live, work and do business.
       Within Rabobank, Analytics Accelerators is an ambitious department that aims to mix in a healthy dose of experience, innovation and creativity in order to develop innovative products and services. We focus on fast learning, delivering value quickly and being more effective. As a team, you work on clear goals and continuously see the results of your (team) efforts., + You can find answers to the most frequently asked questions on rabobank.jobs/nl/veelgestelde-vragen.
          + A security check is part of the process.
          + We respect your privacy.
       #LI-AL2
       Applying In 5 steps
       We'd like to get to know you.
       Step 1 Applying
       Thanks for applying! We consider all the CVs and covering letters that we receive. After the closing date, you will hear from us as soon as possible.
       Step 2 First interview
       Usually you'll be meeting with your (potential) team leader and an immediate (future) colleague. We are keen to get a sense of whether you are a good fit for the position and our team. And you probably have a lot of questions too.
       Step 3 Second interview
       We want to speak to you a second time. In this online meeting, we will delve deeper into the details of what the job entails. Another colleague will often join the interview too.
       Step 4 Offer
       If you are a good match for us and we're a good match for you, then you'll receive a good offer by email. Some positions require you to undergo further assessment first.
job_details.full_text:
Full Stack Engineer

+ Gross monthly salary between EUR 5,115 and EUR 7,308 (scale 10) for a 36 hour week
          + Thirteenth month's salary and 8% holiday allowance
          + 11% Employee Benefit Budget
          + EUR 1,400 development budget per year
          + Hybrid working: balance between home and office work (possible for most roles)
          + A pension, for which you can set the maximum amount of your personal contribution
       Are you comfortable building all components of our next-level GenAI solutions as a full-stack software engineer?
       Good! Then read on...
       You and your job
       We need your help to design, build and run groundbreaking GenAI solutions that are as valuable for our customers to use as they are fun for us to develop. As a Full Stack Engineer you will join a multi-disciplinary team where you will have end-to-end responsible for your solutions.
       Practical examples
          + Work directly with (internal) customers to learn how processes and systems work.
          + Design and build responsible and cost effective GenAI solutions for millions of customers.
          + Convert these generic parts to re-usable building blocks used by 1000+ tech teams.
          + Pair-program with team members to solve critical or complex problems.
       Facts & figures
          + 36 or 40 hours a week.
          + Mostly greenfields, little legacy.
          + 43,822 Rabobank colleagues around the world.
       Top responsibilities
          + Design, build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable GenAI solutions.
          + Contribute to the relentless automation of the above activities.
          + Give and receive help from peers, experts and stakeholders so we can improve together.
       We believe that bringing together people's differences is what makes us an even better bank. Talking of Rabobank: We are a Dutch bank that operates in 38 countries for over 9,5000,000 customers. Together with these customers, our members and partners we stand side by side to create a world in which everyone has access to enough healthy food. In the Netherlands we work to create a country in which people are happy with how they live, work and do business.
       Within Rabobank, Analytics Accelerators is an ambitious department that aims to mix in a healthy dose of experience, innovation and creativity in order to develop innovative products and services. We focus on fast learning, delivering value quickly and being more effective. As a team, you work on clear goals and continuously see the results of your (team) efforts., + You can find answers to the most frequently asked questions on rabobank.jobs/nl/veelgestelde-vragen.
          + A security check is part of the process.
          + We respect your privacy.
       #LI-AL2
       Applying In 5 steps
       We'd like to get to know you.
       Step 1 Applying
       Thanks for applying! We consider all the CVs and covering letters that we receive. After the closing date, you will hear from us as soon as possible.
       Step 2 First interview
       Usually you'll be meeting with your (potential) team leader and an immediate (future) colleague. We are keen to get a sense of whether you are a good fit for the position and our team. And you probably have a lot of questions too.
       Step 3 Second interview
       We want to speak to you a second time. In this online meeting, we will delve deeper into the details of what the job entails. Another colleague will often join the interview too.
       Step 4 Offer
       If you are a good match for us and we're a good match for you, then you'll receive a good offer by email. Some positions require you to undergo further assessment first.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description explicitly mentions 'GenAI solutions' multiple times and focuses on designing, building, and running these solutions. It highlights responsibilities like building RAG systems (implied by 'responsible and cost effective GenAI solutions for millions of customers' and 're-usable building blocks'), fine-tuning (implied by 'groundbreaking GenAI solutions'), and developing complex agents (implied by 'end-to-end responsible for your solutions' within a multi-disciplinary team). The emphasis on building user-facing software systems and deploying them ('design, build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable GenAI solutions') aligns perfectly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work directly with (internal) customers to learn how processes and systems work' indicates a need to understand the business context and customer needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Work directly with (internal) customers to learn how processes and systems work

job_tasks.justification: The core of the role is building 'GenAI solutions', which directly relates to developing and implementing generative models.

The role involves being a 'Full Stack Engineer' responsible for 'building all components of our next-level GenAI solutions' and converting 'generic parts to re-usable building blocks', indicating traditional software development for applications.
job_tasks.phrase: building all components of our next-level GenAI solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Convert these generic parts to re-usable building blocks used by 1000+ tech teams' implies building scalable and reusable software components.
job_tasks.phrase: Convert these generic parts to re-usable building blocks used by 1000+ tech teams

job_tasks.justification: The responsibility to 'Design, build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable GenAI solutions' encompasses the full lifecycle management of AI systems in production.
job_tasks.phrase: Design, build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable GenAI solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Contribute to the relentless automation of the above activities' directly points to MLOps practices for automating deployment and operational tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the relentless automation of the above activities

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Pair-program with team members to solve critical or complex problems' indicates collaboration and knowledge sharing.
The responsibility 'Give and receive help from peers, experts and stakeholders so we can improve together' highlights communication and collaboration.
job_tasks.phrase: Give and receive help from peers, experts and stakeholders

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'solve critical or complex problems' directly relates to problem-solving skills.
The phrase 'end-to-end responsible for your solutions' implies taking ownership of the entire development and deployment process.

soft_skills.phrase: Give and receive help from peers, experts and stakeholders
